ComicInfo.Summary:
Chibi Tomoe and the Zo Ninja, Part 3: Chibi Tomoe pursues the ninja elephant but he cleverly disguises himself as a tree.
The Hidden Part Four: Ishida and Usagi fight their way out of the trap the Toady set for them, but Oda gets away with the incriminating box. The investigation leads to a carpenter named Hama who is a Christian but doesn't know what had been inside the box.
ComicInfo.Title: Chibi Tomoe and the Zo Ninja, Part 3; The Hidden Part Four
ComicInfo.Writer: Julie Fujii Sakai,Stan Sakai,Julie Fujii-Sakai,Stan Sakai,Julie Fujii-Sakai
